Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at 79th/Avalon
ShortDescription: 79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Cottage Grove, 76th, Stony Island and 79th due to, street blockage near 79th/Avalon.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 79th, Cottage Grove, 76th, Stony Island and 79th due to, street blockage near 79th/Avalon.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Morse
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Morse due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Morse due to police activity.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
